name: Pokémon Digimon New World
summary: ﻿Digimon New World is a remake of Pokemon FireRed for RPG Platform in the English Language. The creatures looked like an amalgamation of creatures from different franchises and sometimes behaved like video game characters. Now, there is a new Digimon series on the rise, one that seems to be more grounded in reality and follows a group of ordinary people who must save their city from being taken over by mysterious forces.
